title: Medium-Risk Validators
description: Add comprehensive test coverage for the 4 MEDIUM-risk validators with moderate complexity (355 lines total). Target >90% branch coverage through method-level and error-path testing.

findings.noPrivateMethods: All 4 Sprint 2 validators use inline validation only - no private methods exist
findings.typeDefinitions: InductiveThought and DeductiveThought have dedicated types; ConstraintValidator and RecursiveValidator use generic Thought
findings.validationStyle: Keyword-based content validation rather than structured data validation

tasks.description: Add tests for constraint.ts (84 lines, inline validation)
tasks.actualImplementation: Inline validation only - validates constraints array, keyword presence, solution satisfaction language
details: - Finite domain with valid values passes
- Integer domain with valid bounds passes
- Interval domain with valid [min, max] passes
- Constraint referencing unknown variable triggers error
- Constraint with invalid arity triggers error
tasks.notes: Smallest validator in sprint. Focus on domain type validation and constraint arity.

tasks.description: Add tests for deductive.ts (118 lines, inline validation)
tasks.actualImplementation: Inline validation - premises array, conclusion string, validityCheck boolean, logicForm recognition, soundnessCheck
details: - Premise with valid truth value passes
- Logical form with wrong premise count triggers warning
- Mismatch between validity and soundness triggers warning
tasks.notes: Test all standard logical forms. Pay attention to premise count requirements for each form.

tasks.description: Add tests for inductive.ts (104 lines, inline validation)
tasks.actualImplementation: Inline validation - observations array, generalization string, confidence (0-1), sampleSize, counterexamples info
details: - Generalization scope 'universal' with few observations triggers warning
- High confidence with few observations triggers warning
- Many counterexamples with high confidence triggers warning
tasks.notes: Focus on observation-to-generalization patterns. Test confidence bounds and scope validation.

tasks.description: Add tests for recursive.ts (110 lines, inline validation)
tasks.actualImplementation: Inline validation - keyword-based checks for base case, recursive keywords, dependencies, combination logic, termination
details: - Base case without result triggers error
- Step referencing undefined parameter triggers error
tasks.notes: Test recursion depth limits and termination condition validation. Watch for depth boundary conditions.

successCriteria: All 4 test files created and passing
No breaking changes to existing validators
All MEDIUM-risk validators have >90% branch coverage
Every private validation method has dedicated test block
Every issues.push() call is triggered by at least one test
notes: Sprint 2 covers the 4 MEDIUM-risk validators (355 lines, ~40 error paths, ~9 warning paths). Deductive and inductive form the core reasoning triad with abductive. Each private method gets its own describe() block.
